title: Instructional Design Expert Program for Strengthening Community-Based Organizational Assessment Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational assessment methodologies, organizational development theories, and community-based project experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment configuration for strengthening practice-oriented competencies

learning_goals: Learners acquire instructional design competencies to develop evaluation systems for community-based organizations.
Learners can apply organizational change models and stakeholder motivation strategies to competency enhancement programs.
Learners can plan, implement, and evaluate competency development projects reflecting the characteristics of community sectors.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
